attributes.action: For the British peoples safety stop jihadists returning to live in the UK!!
attributes.additional_details: For the British peoples safety please stop all jihadists trying to returning from Syria to live back in the UK immediately!!  Send these monsters back to Syria to be punished for war crimes against humanity.  Hand them over to asad or the kurds to be punished these ppl gave up there rights to be citizens of the United Kingdom the day they left to join Islamic state
attributes.background: When our own people left Britain in 2013 14 and 15 to fight and kill for Islamic state these people now after killing, rapeing Christians and threatening our way of life now want to come home this is wrong and should not happen for thay are traitors and should have there citizenship revoked..
